WebKit.[DOMNode Additions](/documentation/webkit/domnode-additions)Additions to the `DOMNode` class help convert the structured nodes of DOM content into a rich web-viewable form.[DOMRange Additions](/documentation/webkit/domrange-additions)Additions to the `DOMRange` class facilitate communication between the DOM API and WebKit and help convert web content into standard markup
